name: Zouk
description: Fast-paced danceable pop that began in early 1980s French Antilles, merging and updating more traditional local genres.

children.name: Cabo-Zouk
children.description: Popular in Cape Verde and the Cape Verdean diaspora in Europe and North America, with a slow and sensuous tempo, and favoring more sophisticated studio productions.

children.name: Zouk Love
children.description: More sentimental form of Zouk which emerged in the mid-1980s.
